name: Checklist Plugin
description: A plugin to create, modify, and manage species checklists within Symbiota.

name: Collection Plugin
description: A plugin to create and manage occurrence collections within Symbiota.

name: Crowd Source Plugin
description: A plugin to allow crowd-sourcing for occurrence data edits.

name: Exsiccati Plugin
description: A plugin to connect exsiccati data with occurrence records.

name: Glossary Plugin
description: A plugin to add glossary module to Symbiota.

name: Image Processor Plugin
description: A plugin to add the batch image processing module to Symbiota.

name: Key Plugin
description: A plugin to add the key module to Symbiota.

name: Media Plugin
description: A plugin to add the management of media files to Symbiota.

name: Occurrence Plugin
description: A plugin to add the managment of occurrence records within Symbiota.

name: Occurrence Assiciations Plugin
description: A plugin to track associations within occurrence records.

name: Occurrence Comments Plugin
description: A plugin to add the ability to add comments to occurrence records.

name: Occurrence Dataset Plugin
description: A plugin to add the occurrence dataset module to Symbiota.

name: Occurrence Genetic Plugin
description: A plugin to add the ability to link genetic data to occurrence records.

name: Occurrence Loan Plugin
description: A plugin to add the occurrence loans module to Symbiota.

name: Search Occurrences Plugin
description: A plugin that adds the Search Collections module to Symbiota.

name: Reference Plugin
description: A plugin that adds the reference module to Symbiota.

name: Taxa Plugin
description: Adds the Taxa module to manage taxonomic data.

name: Traits Plugin
description: Adds the Traits Module to Symbiota.
